body: The keywords glossary is looking a bit out of date - there are quite a few new mechanics that could do with a new entry (Miracle, morph, etc).
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Update keywords glossary.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on September 27, 2014 14:58:06_

The keywords glossary is looking a bit out of date - there are quite a few new mechanics that could do with a new entry (Miracle, morph, etc).

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=703_
